# Real Estate Mobile App - Copilot Instructions

This workspace contains a React TypeScript application for browsing real estate properties.

## Project Details

- **Framework**: React with TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Date Handling**: date-fns

## Completed Setup

- [x] Project scaffolding complete
- [x] PropertyCard component implemented
- [x] TypeScript configuration
- [x] Tailwind CSS setup
- [x] Build tasks configured
- [x] Documentation complete

## Key Components

- `src/components/PropertyCard.tsx` - Main property display component
- `src/App.tsx` - Application root with sample data
- `src/main.tsx` - React application entry point

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React functional component patterns
- Maintain responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use proper error handling and loading states

## Next Steps

To run this project:
1. Install Node.js (v18+)
2. Run `npm install`
3. Run `npm run dev`
